com.scalar.db.sql

Interface PreparedStatement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPreparedStatement, DirectModePreparedStatement, ServerModePreparedStatement

    public interface PreparedStatement
    A statement with bind parameters that has been pre-parsed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearParameters()
      Clears the parameters.
      ResultSet execute()
      Executes the statement in this PreparedStatement object.
      PreparedStatement set(int i, Value value)
      Sets the i-th parameter to the specified Value.
      PreparedStatement set(java.lang.String name, Value value)
      Sets the parameter for all occurrences of name to the specified Value.
      default PreparedStatement setBigInt(int i, long value)
      Sets the i-th parameter to the specified BigIng value.

      • clearParameters

        void clearParameters()
        Clears the parameters.

      • execute

        ResultSet execute()
        Executes the statement in this PreparedStatement object.
        Returns:
        a ResultSet object that contains the data produced by the query
        Throws:
        TransactionConflictException - if a transaction conflict happens
        UnknownTransactionStatusException - if the transaction status (committed or aborted) is unknown when executing the COMMIT statement
        SqlException - if an unexpected error happens
